sarpanchMessage.title: Message from Sarpanch
sarpanchMessage.content: We are committed to the overall development of our village and the welfare of all residents. Our team works tirelessly to ensure transparency and efficiency in all our initiatives.

hero.title: Welcome to Khandape Grampanchayat
hero.subtitle: Working towards integrated development and prosperity

welcome.title: Welcome to Khandape Grampanchayat
welcome.message: Khandape Grampanchayat is located in Murbad Taluka, Thane District. Our population is 1,066, including 553 males and 513 females. Our literacy rate is 70.26%. We provide various schemes and services for the welfare of our villagers.
